title: Toy Datasets For TILT
text: goal tiltToyData provide toy datasets TILT.

title: Toy Datasets For TILT
text: can install development version tiltToyData like :

title: Toy Datasets For TILT
code: library(tiltToyData)  files <- toy_datasets() files #> [1] "emissions_profile_any_companies.csv.gz"  path <- toy_dataset(files[[1]]) path #> [1] "/usr/local/lib/R/site-library/tiltToyData/extdata/emissions_profile_any_companies.csv.gz"  head(read.csv(path)) #>                                                  activity_uuid_product_uuid #> 1 0a242b09-772a-5edf-8e82-9cb4ba52a258_ae39ee61-d4d0-4cce-93b4-0745344da5fa #> 2 be06d25c-73dc-55fb-965b-0f300453e380_98b48ff2-2200-4b08-9dec-9c7c0e3585bc #> 3 977d997e-c257-5033-ba39-d0edeeef4ba2_0ace02fa-eca5-482d-a829-c18e46a52db4 #> 4 ebb8475e-ff57-5e4e-937b-b5788186a5ca_ccee034c-8b6c-40d6-ac36-4c70c4623efa #> 5 ebb8475e-ff57-5e4e-937b-b5788186a5ca_ccee034c-8b6c-40d6-ac36-4c70c4623efa #> 6 ebb8475e-ff57-5e4e-937b-b5788186a5ca_ccee034c-8b6c-40d6-ac36-4c70c4623efa #>     clustered                               company_id unit #> 1       stove fleischerei-stiefsohn_00000005219477-001 unit #> 2        oven fleischerei-stiefsohn_00000005219477-001 unit #> 3       steel        pecheries-basques_fra316541-00101   kg #> 4 aged cheese    hoche-butter-gmbh_deu422723-693847001   kg #> 5 aged cheese  vicquelin-espaces-verts_fra697272-00101   kg #> 6      cheese   bst-procontrol-gmbh_00000005104947-001   kg

what: Get path to toy datasets — toy_datasets
title: Get path to toy datasets — toy_datasets
text: package comes bundled number toy datasets 'inst/extdata' directory. Use toy_datasets() list available datasets toy_dataset() retrieve path one example.

title: Get path to toy datasets — toy_datasets
